projects.name: Freedom Park
projects.background: This was the first website I've ever created, it was for the R2H summer boot camp. The purpose was to display proficiency in HTML and CSS. Throughout this project learned a lot about HTML, CSS and asking for help. To this day, this is one of my favorite projects because I love looking back on it and seeing how much I've improved.

projects.name: Gateway
projects.background: This Honduras travel site was my project for the R2H gateway apprenticeship. The purpose of this project was to display proficiency in HTML and CSS. I felt that I was really beginning to grasp CSS and Flexbox throughout this project. I love this project because my mother is Honduran and I've always wanted to visit Honduras and by doing this project, I learned a lot about my mother's home country.

projects.name: Midterm Portfolio
projects.background: This Midterm Portfolio was my project for the Midterms in the R2H apprenticeship. The purpose of this project was to display a technical and professional development project I was proud of and an overall reflection. In this project, I tried new things like different color schemes and gradients, so I learned a lot about legibility and readability throughout this project.

projects.name: Ecommerce - STAY QUIET
projects.background: This is the 3rd version of this Ecommerce site. Throughout the R2H apprenticeship, we worked on this project periodically and implemented newfound knowledge. This is easily my favorite project because I learned about React, databases, and backend servers. I poured my heart and soul into this project and spent hours trying to make it perfect and I am very proud of the end result.

projects.name: Code 4 Justice
projects.contributors: By Seth, Jacky, Sam, Axel & Isaac
projects.background: This was the first group project in the R2H apprenticeship and my favorite group project. This was my favorite group project because I got to work with awesome teammates and I made lasting relationships with my team members. Our team was assigned to create a website to spread awareness of a social cause and we chose immigration reform because we were all passionate about this cause. My contribution was the About Us page and the footer. I used flex to align our headshots, and for the footer, I used Font Awesome because of the high quality and the easy-to-use icons.

projects.name: Netflix Redesign
projects.contributors: By Van, Marty, Puran, Sam, Jacky & Isaac
projects.background: This was the final group project in the R2H apprenticeship. Our team was assigned to find a popular website on the internet and redesign it to our liking. My contribution was the nav, footer, the new and popular page, movies page, and the shows page. I used flex for the nav and footer to align the content, and I used Font Awesome icons. The TMDB API was pulling movies into our pages, but it needed some styling, so I styled it to look close to Netflix's site.
